__e: As professor Faxon's prophecy foretold, Soran's quest...
Darrin, I don't think you should have said that.
Darrin, at this moment I feel very warm towards you, like a father.
Darrin, only two minutes ago, you told me Sam was at home.
Here's all I need to know about you, Darrin-- you're 19 and a male.
Darrin, don't you think you're carrying this thing a little bit too far.
So you see, Darrin, it's really nothing.
Mother, if there's one thing I know about Darrin it's that he's strong and is in perfectly good health.
Darrin, this is much more serious than you predicted.
The fact that I'm married to Darrin doesn't bother you?
Darrin, don't look now. But, if you do look, you won't be able to see yourself.
Darrin can't go, and that is that.
But I can never zap up another Darrin Stephens.
Look me in the eyes and tell me that Darrin Stephens is the most wonderful man in the world.
And who could be more understanding than me dear friend, Mr. Darrin Stephens.
Mother, you just don't understand the kind of relationship that Darrin and I have.
Mother, this happens to be a very important evening for Darrin, you see, and...
